Question
========
The file below contains all grades on the exams for course 1 to course 7 of master students in the program Movement Sciences at the University of Groningen. Calculate the number of students who scored lower or equal to a 3.9 for 3 of the 7 exams. Write your answer in the answer box (no decimal places).

* Download**: [SPSS file](eur-descriptive-217-en-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-descriptive-217-en-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is 124.
